# Talkie

A convenient command-line HTTP client for interacting with APIs and web services.

## Quick Start

```bash
pip install talkie
talkie get https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts/1
```

## Features

- Intuitive syntax for HTTP requests
- Colored output with syntax highlighting
- GraphQL, WebSocket, OpenAPI support
- Parallel requests and request history
- Environment configuration
